attributes.action: Abolish the need to fill out application forms for employment to licenced security officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that SIA licenced security officers like myself, should not need to fill out an application form for employment In the security Industry, as all employee details are held via a chip on the SIA licence card which Is directly linked to the SIA database.It Is a tedious process that should not be required
